data_snapshot.price_action: Gold closed at 4667.89 after strong intraday rally (H:4690.27, L:4618.99), above all EMAs and near upper Bollinger Band. SPX flat at 6877.54, VIX elevated at 19.22, DXY stable at 98.83

data_snapshot.cross_assets: Gold strength despite stable DXY suggests non-dollar driven rally. Elevated VIX (19.22) indicates risk-off sentiment, contrasting with Gold's bullish breakout

analysis.trend: Strong bullish trend for Gold with momentum confirmation, risk-off environment supporting safe-haven flows

Strong momentum indicators (RSI OB, MACD bullish)
High volatility regime supporting directional moves
analysis.reasoning: Gold demonstrates clear breakout characteristics: price above all moving averages (E9:4574.9, E21:4483.51, E50:4323.98, E200:3774.8), strong bullish momentum signals (EMA_BULL_STACK, RSI_OB, STRONG_UP), and high volatility regime.
